sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.TransferAuditToRotations2</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Transfer all the sys_audit data into as many rotations as needed to hold all the data</description>
        <name>TransferAuditToRotations2</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TransferAuditToRotations2 = Class.create();

TransferAuditToRotations2.prototype = {
  initialize : function() {
  },
  process: function(idEnds) {
     this.idEnds = idEnds;
     this.messages = new Array();
     this.total = 0;
     this._transferData(); 
  },

  _transferData: function() {
     var query = '';
     if (this.idEnds != '') {
        var ids = this.idEnds.split(",");
        for (var i = 0; i < ids.length; i++) {
           ids[i] = "sys_idENDSWITH" + ids[i];
        }

        query = "record_checkpoint!=0^";
        query += ids.join("^OR");
     }

     this.addMessage(query);
     var t = new GlideTransferAuditDataHelper(worker, query);
     this.total = t.transfer();
  },

  addMessage: function(msg) {
     gs.log(msg);
     this.messages.push(msg);
     if (this.messages.length >= 10)
        this.messages.shift();

     worker.addMessage(this.messages.join("\n"));
  },
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>don goodliffe</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2011-03-01 22:12:32</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>737ad30d0a0005a51a91dd8c4c796a0b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TransferAuditToRotations2</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Database Rotation" source="com.snc.db.rotation">e5adf40b6d2220100acb70b35343304b</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_737ad30d0a0005a51a91dd8c4c796a0b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>don goodliffe</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2011-03-03 22:00:30</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>948</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
